```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test is_idempot.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
matrix_T_1 <- matrix(
  data = c(
    1, 0,
    0, 1
  ),
  ncol = 2
)
matrix_T_2 <- matrix(
  data = c(
    3, 1,
    -6, -2
  ),
  ncol = 2
)
matrix_T_3 <- matrix(
  data = c(
    1, 0, 0,
    0, 1, 0,
    0, 0, 1
  ),
  ncol = 3
)
matrix_T_4 <- matrix(
  data = c(
    2, -1, 1,
    -2, 3, -2,
    -4, 4, -3
  ),
  ncol = 3
)
matrix_F <- matrix(
  data = 1,
  nrow = 2,
  ncol = 2
)
colnames(matrix_T_1) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_T_1))
rownames(matrix_T_1) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_T_1))
colnames(matrix_T_2) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_T_2))
rownames(matrix_T_2) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_T_2))
colnames(matrix_T_3) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_T_3))
rownames(matrix_T_3) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_T_3))
colnames(matrix_T_4) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_T_4))
rownames(matrix_T_4) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_T_4))
colnames(matrix_F) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_F))
rownames(matrix_F) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_F))
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_F,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Non-Nilpotent Matrix"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_T_1,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Nilpotent Matrix"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_T_2,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Nilpotent Matrix"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_T_3,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Nilpotent Matrix"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_T_4,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Nilpotent Matrix"
)
```


## Results


```{r results}
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Item = c(
      "Non-Nilpotent Matrix",
      "Nilpotent Matrix",
      "Nilpotent Matrix",
      "Nilpotent Matrix",
      "Nilpotent Matrix"
    ),
    Parameter = c(
      "FALSE",
      "TRUE",
      "TRUE",
      "TRUE",
      "TRUE"
    ),
    Results = c(
      is_idempot(matrix_F),
      is_idempot(matrix_T_1),
      is_idempot(matrix_T_2),
      is_idempot(matrix_T_3),
      is_idempot(matrix_T_4)
    )
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01, echo=TRUE}
test_that("is_idempot is TRUE", {
  expect_true(
    is_idempot(matrix_T_1)
  )
  expect_true(
    is_idempot(matrix_T_2)
  )
  expect_true(
    is_idempot(matrix_T_3)
  )
  expect_true(
    is_idempot(matrix_T_4)
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_02, echo=TRUE}
test_that("is_idempot is FALSE", {
  expect_false(
    is_idempot(matrix_F)
  )
})
```
